commit message: Add a Settings activity/menu-item to control how many subjects are downloaded in advance.

Classify: Use a ? icon for the Examples action in the action bar.

The icon is from the Action Bar Icon Pack:
https://developer.android.com/design/downloads/index.html
QuestionFragment: Define the menu items in XML instead of code.
SubjectFragment: Define the (single item) menu in XML instead of code.

Options menu: Move common menu items (like About) to the bottom.

By using orderInCategory even though there are no categories defined.
ItemsContentProvider: Re-comment out a debugging line that wiped the database.
